name: observationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves watching someone or something carefully and closely, in order to learn something: These two theories have been observationally confirmed. Observationally and experimentally we have demonstrated this. See
observational
More examplesFewer examplesobservationally based studiesThe two models are observationally equivalent.We were able to prove these claims observationally.
